segment.source: Get Minecraft Education Edition
segment.target: Get Minecraft Education Edition

segment.source: Applies to:
segment.target: Applies to:

segment.source: Windows 10
segment.target: Windows 10

segment.source: Minecraft: Education Edition is built for learning.
segment.target: Minecraft: Education Edition is built for learning.

segment.source: Watch this video to learn more about Minecraft.
segment.target: Watch this video to learn more about Minecraft.

segment.source: Teachers and IT administrators can now get early access to Minecraft Education Edition and add it their Microsoft Store for Business for distribution.
segment.target: Teachers and IT administrators can now get early access to Minecraft Education Edition and add it their Microsoft Store for Business for distribution.

segment.source: education.minecraft.net
segment.target: education.minecraft.net

segment.source: Prerequisites
segment.target: Prerequisites

segment.source: Minecraft Education Edition requires Windows 10.
segment.target: Minecraft Education Edition requires Windows 10.

segment.source: Early access to Minecraft Education Edition is offered to education tenants that are managed by Azure Active Directory (Azure AD).
segment.target: Early access to Minecraft Education Edition is offered to education tenants that are managed by Azure Active Directory (Azure AD).

segment.source: If your school doesn't have an Azure AD tenant, the IT administrator can set one up as part of the process of getting Minecraft Education Edition.
segment.target: If your school doesn't have an Azure AD tenant, the IT administrator can set one up as part of the process of getting Minecraft Education Edition.

segment.source: Office 365, which includes online versions of Office apps plus 1 TB online storage and Microsoft Classroom, is free for teachers and students.
segment.target: Office 365, which includes online versions of Office apps plus 1 TB online storage and Microsoft Classroom, is free for teachers and students.

segment.source: Sign up your school for Office 365 Education.
segment.target: Sign up your school for Office 365 Education.

segment.source: If your school has an Office 365 Education subscription, it includes a free Azure AD subscription.
segment.target: If your school has an Office 365 Education subscription, it includes a free Azure AD subscription.

segment.source: Register your free Azure AD subscription.
segment.target: Register your free Azure AD subscription.
